price: as a mercy from your Lord. He is indeed the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing,
arabic: رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
